instructions:
Splittermond is a (untranslated) german RPG, produced and maintained by the german Uhrwerk-Verlag. 
 Learn more about it at the official [website](https://splittermond.de/). 
 For issues, ideas, suggestions and critique reach out for me on [roll20](https://app.roll20.net/users/800624), [github](https://github.com/ap3h3ad) or [Drachenzwinge](https://www.drachenzwinge.de/forum/index.php?action=profile;u=8933). 

 I'm very pleased with the amount of love I, as a developer, get from you, the players, in form of compliments and critics. But if you really REALLY want to support me financially (and some of you asked for it), you can do it via [Paypal](https://paypal.me/dabewi?locale.x=de_DE).
